DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effect of heart rate on cardiac index in patients with or without left ventricular hypertrophy. The study will be conducted in postoperative heart surgery patients with a pacemaker.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Heart Rate on Cardiac Index in Patients With Left Ventricular Hypertrophy
DOC.criteria: Scheduled heart surgery including thoracotomy Ejection fraction > 45% Duration of QRS complex < 120 milliseconds Sinus rhythm Planned perioperative temporary pacemaker Group: Left ventricular hypertrophy: Thickness of interventricular septum and posterior wall >11 mm. Group: No left ventricular hypertrophy: Thickness of interventricular septum and posterior wall <11 mm. Active endocarditis Severe mitral insufficiency No patient consent
